Rule.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_D3D12
Rule.Description: Options for the Microsoft.Direct3D.D3D12 NuGet Package

StringProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_D3D12_D3D12SDKPath
StringProperty.Description: Specify the exe relative D3D12SDKPath export to modify the copy destination for d3d12core.dll etc.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_D3D12_SkipLibraryCopy
BoolProperty.Description: Disables copying D3D12Core.dll and D3D12Core.pdb into the project output directory.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_D3D12_SkipDebugLayerCopy
BoolProperty.Description: Disables copying D3D12SDKLayers.dll and D3D12SDKLayers.pdb into the project output directory. This 'debug layer' is used for development only.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_D3D12_SkipIncludeDir
BoolProperty.Description: Disables appending the package's include folder as an additional include directory.
